text: Sharon Christa McAuliffe (September 2, 1948 â€“ January 28, 1986) was an American teacher from Concord, New Hampshire. She was a member of the crew of Space Shuttle Challenger, who were killed in the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official NASA biography * Challenger Center bio Category:1948 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Scientists from New Hampshire Category:American teachers Category:American astronauts Category:Scientists from Boston Category:People from Concord, New Hampshire Category:Educators from Boston Category:Educators from New Hampshire
